description: The Flavorextradata.py contains a Nova extension flavor_extra_data which seems to be useless. This needs to be deleted.
title: flavor_extra_data extension is meaningless

comments.content: The Flavorextradata.py contains a Nova extension flavor_extra_data which seems to be useless. This needs to be deleted.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~unmesh-gurjar

comments.content: Can you explain how it is 'useless'?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content: I'm assuming you mean it doesnt have any actual extension resources. Is this correct?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content: Yes, I mean the extension does not add any functionality.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~unmesh-gurjar

comments.content: Ideally we would move the associated code out of our core controller into the official extension.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
